alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Broome, Tioga, southeastern Tompkins, western Susquehanna and northeastern Bradford Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Danby to Wysox. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Vestal, Endicott, Barton, Sayre, Maine, Rush, Owego, Danby and Caroline. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 62 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
